com.salesforce.androidsdk.security

Class PasscodeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.androidsdk.security.PasscodeManager

  • public class PasscodeManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages the inactivity timeout, and keeps track of if the UI should locked etc.
    Author:
    wmathurin, bhariharan

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PasscodeManager.HashConfig
      Key for hashing and salts to be preprended and appended to data to increase entropy.

                                    int timeout,
                                    int passLen)

        Stores the mobile policy for the specified account.
        Parameters:
        account - UserAccount instance.
        timeout - Timeout value, in ms.
        passLen - Minimum passcode length.

                                    int timeout,
                                    int passLen,
                                    boolean bioAllowed)
        Stores the mobile policy for the specified account.
        Parameters:
        account - UserAccount instance.
        timeout - Timeout value, in ms.
        passLen - Minimum passcode length.
        bioAllowed - If biometric Unlock is Allowed by connected App

      • onResume

        public boolean onResume(Activity ctx)
        To be called by passcode protected activity when being resumed When passcode screen is about to be shown, false is returned, the activity will be resumed once the user has successfully enter her passcode
        Returns:
        true if the resume should be allowed to continue and false otherwise

      • recordUserInteraction

        public void recordUserInteraction()
        To be called by passcode protected activity whenever there is a user interaction

      • setTimeoutMs

        public void setTimeoutMs(int newTimeout)
        Called when the access timeout for the org changes.
        Parameters:
        newTimeout - New access timeout value.

      • getTimeoutMs

        public int getTimeoutMs()
        The current inactivity timeout before the app locks, in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        the inactivity timeout

      • getMinPasscodeLength

        public int getMinPasscodeLength()
        Deprecated. Will be removed in Mobile SDK 8.0. Use getPasscodeLength() instead.

      • getPasscodeLength

        public int getPasscodeLength()
        The exact length of the passcode if it is known. It may be unknown on upgrade before first unlock. Use getPasscodeLengthKnown() to check if return is exact length or org minimum.
        Returns:
        passcode length

      • getPasscodeLengthKnown

        public boolean getPasscodeLengthKnown()
        Whether or not the exact passcode length is known. It may be unknown on upgrade before first unlock. Use getPasscodeLength() to get the length.
        Returns:
        true if the length is known

      • biometricAllowed

        public boolean biometricAllowed()
        Whether or not the connected app allows biometric as an alternative to passcode.
        Returns:
        true if biometric is allowed

      • biometricEnrollmentShown

        public boolean biometricEnrollmentShown()
        Whether or not the user has been shown the screen prompting them to enroll in biometric unlock.
        Returns:
        true if the user has been prompted to enable biometric

      • biometricEnabled

        public boolean biometricEnabled()
        Whether or not the user has enabled the ability to use biometric to bypass passcode.
        Returns:
        true if the user has enabled biometric

      • setMinPasscodeLength

        public void setMinPasscodeLength(Context ctx,
                                 int minPasscodeLength)
        Deprecated. Will be removed in Mobile SDK 8.0. Use setPasscodeLength(Context, int) instead.
        Parameters:
        ctx - Context.
        minPasscodeLength - The new minimum passcode length to set.

      • setPasscodeLength

        public void setPasscodeLength(Context ctx,
                              int passcodeLength)
        Parameters:
        ctx - Context.
        passcodeLength - The new passcode length to set.

      • setPasscodeLengthKnown

        public void setPasscodeLengthKnown(Context ctx,
                                   boolean lengthKnown)
        This method can be used to force the stored or default passcode length to be trusted upon upgrade if set to 'true'.
        Parameters:
        ctx - Context
        lengthKnown - Whether or not the passcode length is known.

      • setBiometricAllowed

        public void setBiometricAllowed(Context ctx,
                                boolean allowed)
        Called when biometric unlock requirement for the org changes.

      • setBiometricEnrollmentShown

        public void setBiometricEnrollmentShown(Context ctx,
                                        boolean shown)
        By default biometric enrollment is only shown to the user once.
        Parameters:
        shown - set to true to show biometric prompt on next passcode unlock.

      • setBiometricEnabled

        public void setBiometricEnabled(Context ctx,
                                boolean enabled)
        Sets biometric enabled.

      • shouldLock

        public boolean shouldLock()
        Returns:
        true if time elapsed since the last user activity in the app exceeds the timeoutMs

      • showLockActivity

        public void showLockActivity(Context ctx)

      • unlock

        public void unlock()
        This is used when unlocking via the fingerprint authentication. The passcode hash isn't updated as the authentication is verified by the OS.

        protected long now()
